Class MainMenuController

java.lang.Object
org.example.circuit_project.MiscControllers.MainMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainMenuController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the main menu after user login. Provides navigation options to tutorial, sandbox playground, profile page, and logout.

    Hides the sandbox preview image when the user moves the cursor away.

    Initializes the main menu controller and sets up hover behavior and button actions.

    Logs the user out and returns to the login screen.
    void
    showAboutOverlay()
    Shows the "About" overlay pane with fade-in animation.
    void
    showSandboxImage()
    Displays the sandbox preview image when the user hovers over the sandbox option.
